# Configuration for module: libparsifal

set( HEADER_FILES

  include/libparsifal/xmlpool.h
  include/libparsifal/xmlsbuf.h
  include/libparsifal/xmlvect.h

set( SOURCE_FILES 
  src/bistream.c
  src/dtdvalid.c
  src/encoding.c
  src/parsifal.c
  src/xmlhash.c
  src/xmlpool.c
  src/xmlsbuf.c
  src/xmlvect.c
)



if (WIN32)
  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    win32/vc6/dllmain.c
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "WIN32" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

endif ()

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

set( MODULE_NAME "libparsifal" )
add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "PARSIFAL_BUILD_MODULE;PARSIFAL_CUSTOM_GUCEF_BUILD" )
set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY VERSION 1.1.0.0 )
set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY SOVERSION 1.1.0.0 )

include_directories( include include/libparsifal )



#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED TEMPLATED ADDITION CONTENT ********




if (OSX)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN32)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN64)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
else()
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
endif()
